transcript:
Customer: Hello
Customer: Guru Narayan roop hai guru gyan ko ghat
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Executive: Haan ji sir wo call disconnect ho gaya tha aapka.
Customer: Haan chalo koi baat nahi bataiye.
Executive: Haan haan main keh raha hu sir dekhiye aap jaisa aap keh rahe hai na ki aapke paas bulk wali bhi buyleads aati hai isme. Wo ye actually B to B platform hi hai aapka yaha pe B to B business wale hi aate hai rarely hum maan lijiye sir yaha pe agar hum aapke paas se requirement dalega hamare paas bhi 10 KB requirement dalega 50 KB dalega 100 KB dalega hum wo sari leads isme post karte hai ab wo aapke upar depend abhi dekh lijiye abhi yaha pe jo hai 250 piece ki ek requirement aayi hai cotton bath towel ki 12 ghante pehle ye Andhra Pradesh ki.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: To yahi cheez hai isme aap jitna isme active rahenge utni aapko leads bhi dekhiye agar ye lead paanch logo ne consume kar li to ye yaha se hat jayegi fir aap baad me jab kabhi check karenge aap bolenge ki bulk wali leads nahi aati. To yahi sab cheeze hai.
Customer: Aap dekhna usme kya hai.
Customer: Aise aise nahi hota hai ki sirf bulk wali dikhte humko aisa nahi hai.
Customer: Sab dikhenge humko.
Executive: Haan aapko sari dikhengi but aapko filter ka use karna padega maine aapko us din jab video meet hui thi hamari to maine aapko dikhaya tha na ki waha pe sabse upar ek option aata hai bulk 25 ke agar phone se check karte hai aap log.
Customer: Haan barabar hai to wo click karte hai to koi lead dikhai nahi deti usme relevant leads are not available bolke aata hai fir niche uski retail wali aati hai sari.
Executive: Haan to sir main wahi to keh raha hu dekhiye yaha pe maan lijiye aapne sab bulk wala filter laga diya us time pe may be ho sakta hai waha pe bulk wali leads available na ho kyuki IndiaMART pe har do minute me aadhe ghante abhi dekhiye ek 5000 lead ki 5000 piece ki buylead post hui hai cotton towel ki do minute pehle just ab agar ye buylead agar paanch logo ne consume kar li to ye hat jayegi abhi aap ek baar IndiaMART ke app open kijiye abhi.
Customer: Nahi wo theek hai abhi mere ko ye bataiye ye bol rahe hai hum dekh rahe hai isko aise hi ho raha hai wo.
Customer: Jaise ki
Customer: Leads aa rahi hai jyada piece wali bhi aa rahi hai lekin kam piece wali jyada percentage hai matlab 70 30 aa rahi hai aise aa rahi hai.
Executive: Sorry sorry kya bola aapne?
Customer: 70% retail aa rahi hai 30% wholesale aa rahi hai.
Executive: To sir main wahi cheez sir main aapko wahi cheez to samjhana chahta hu kyuki dekhiye sir sab wholesale wala business ke purpose se isme join hote hai ab maan lijiye aap 10 jane hai aapke area me theek hai aapko wholesale wali chahiye agar hum 100 leads post karenge jo jyada active rahega wo consume kar lega na abhi dekhiye do minute pehle just 5000 piece wali buylead aayi hai abhi aapne open karke check nahi kara hai theek hai agar maan lijiye koi paanch buyer active honge abhi agar unhone lead di unhone dekha consume kar li to aapke paas aap chatthe buyer honge to aapke paas to show nahi karegi na sir fir ye lead to wo rehta 50 50% hai 50% aapki retail ki hogi 50% uski hogi hai na but consume karne ke aapko wo lead kam dikhai deti hai kyuki wo lead aate ke sath hi consume kar lete hai log.
Customer: Jaise ki abhi yaha pe do minute bhi dikha raha hai main thodi der baad refresh karunga to ye leads gayab ho jati hai kyuki inko paanch log consume kar lete hai to consume hone ke baad hum usko.
Customer: Chalo abhi abhi ye chalo main samajh gaya abhi dhyan to rakhte hi hum dono hai to rakhte hai dhyan me rahega ki kaunsi lead aa rahi hai consume kaunsi karni hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ab yearly wali ka kaise karenge usko aap reset kariye 10 pe.
Executive: Yearly sir yearly wali dobara 10 se nahi hongi wo wo to aap consume kar chuke hai wo to consume.
Customer: Nahi humko pata hi nahi tha ye yearly wali hum consume kar rahe hai humko kaise pata yearly wali aapne yearly ka baat hi nahi kiya hamare se.
Executive: Sir to consume to ho rahi thi na sir usme wo.
Customer: Nahi consume ho rahi barabar hai lekin hum to samajh rahe hai ki ye weekly wali me se ho rahi hai.
Executive: Sir weekly wali ye to baat hui thi na meri aapse ki maine aapko kaha tha sir ki weekly wali leads aapko Monday ko milegi.
Customer: To ye bhi nahi bole the aapke yearly wali consume karenge aap yadi abhi use kar rahe hai to.
Executive: Sir dekhiye aap to humko se jab apni baat hui thi kya aap use kariye consume kariye isko abhi 8000 piece wali maine aapko daily bonus wala bola tha maine aapko kya kaha tha daily bonus wala aapko daily milega daily bonus aap ek use kar lijiye ha wo baat meri thi wo miss ho gaya tha ki maine aapko yearly wala nahi bataya ki yearly wali nahi ye yearly wali to aapko Mayank bhai aap jisse bhi baat karo Sohel bhai se karo wo reset kariye humko nahi pata tha ha ye bhi nahi hai ki humne koi deal final kari us pe use hua to.
Customer: Ab naya customer hai aap batane me bhul gaye aur hum samajhne me abhi dekhe raat me baith ke dono hum baap bete to samajh me aaya ki yearly wali five bata rahe hai to Arshit bola mere ko ki yearly wali main kahi to dekha usne bole 10 di hai aur usme se paanch hi bachi hai maine kaha apne ko pata hi nahi apni kyu use karte the na yearly wali bahut precious hoti hai hamare liye maan lo emergency me koi badhiya order hai to hum usko tab use karenge na.
Executive: Ek minute sir hold kijiye aap.
(silence)
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji sir very good morning bataiye kya.
Customer: Haan ji madam wo main bol raha tha ki jaise abhi hum Sunday ko main aur mera ladka baith ke dono use karte hai app apna to yearly wali leads five bata rahe the to wo actually abhi Mayank bhai ne bhi bataya ki actually 10 di hui hai humko to wo five consume ho gayi yearly ki koi baat hi nahi humko elaborate kiye ki yearly wali leads milenge aapko 10 bolke hum nahi karte the na madam consume.
Executive: Accha to matlab jo yearly aapko leads mili thi wo aapne consume kar liya right?
Customer: Humko pata hi nahi madam hum to wo sham ko baith ke dono main aur Arshit baith ke dekh rahe the na ki leads kaisi kaisi bachi hai wo aana aisa khul gaya menu humko bhi menu bhi to hum abhi user friendly nahi hai na to wo hum dekh rahe the usme to usme dikhaya ki yearly wali paanch bachi hai wo Arshit bola yearly wali bata rahe hai isme apne to koi aapke jitne bhi mere hamare aapke representative baat kare na yearly ki lead ki kisi ne baat nahi ki hamare se.
Executive: To sir kya dikkat hai aapne kar liya to consume koi nahi ab aapko.
Customer: Nahi kar liya to madam samjhe nahi aap baat ko.
Executive: Mil rahi hai na ab Sunday ko aapko 10 lead milengi aur Monday to Saturday aapko ek ek bonus milengi to ab aap.
Customer: Nahi nahi madam wo vishay nahi hai nahi nahi wo vishay wo ek baju me rakhiye wo vishay alag ho gaya yearly wali lead ka importance kyu hai hamare liye maan lo abhi koi achi lead hamare ye lead wali wali ho gayi abhi bhi aapke paas paanch lead bachi hai yearly me abhi bhi aapke paas paanch lead bachi hai.
Customer: Nahi first mera point kya hai madam yearly wali hamare se kisi ne baat nahi kari hum usko fir cautiously use karte the na madam 10 me se maan lo ek aad use karte the.
Executive: Haan haan aapke paas hai sir aap abhi nahi madam abhi meri dekho hamara aaj waise ka dekha jaye to hamara day one aaj se shuru hua hai aap yearly wale hamare ko reset karke 10 leads dijiye humko please.
Executive: Sir ye to possible nahi hai ye aapko 10 mil chuki hai ye to possible nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi ye humko bataya nahi na madam aapne.
Executive: Yearly me paanch paanch bachi hui hai sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi madam mere ko reset karke dijiye madam ye nahi aise nahi humko bataya nahi aapne hum kyu use karte the hum to Monday se jyada active hote the.
Executive: Service live hui thi Saturday ko ya Sunday ko live hui hai matlab.
Customer: Nahi nahi Friday ko live kar diye the.
Executive: 19th November se matlab apni live hui hai to hum matlab aapko guide karne hi wale the but beech me Saturday Sunday gap ho gaya iski wajah se humne aapko.
Customer: Nahi Saturday ko bhi aapka shuru tha madam platform maine.
Executive: Shuru tha sir to hamara off tha na sir hum kaise aapko call karke guide karte aap ye batao aap.
Customer: Mayank ji se baat ho rahi thi na Saturday ko.
Executive: Kisse?
Customer: Mayank ji se aapki baat ho rahi thi but us din hamara off tha system nahi tha to hum aapko guide nahi kar sakte the na baki services ke liye to abhi aap 10 se paanch aapne use kar li paanch aapki bachegi aap paanch usko matlab jab aapko zarurat pade.
Customer: Nahi madam ye dekhiye jab tak abhi hum jante hai ki yearly wali bahut precious hai hamare liye yearly wali me zarurat padegi na madam.
Executive: Kar liya na sir.
Customer: Nahi isko to aap reset karke dijiye hamare request hai humko pata nahi tha.
Executive: Sir aisa to nahi hai ki lapse ho gayi ya fir kuch aisa ho gaya fir aapne use kar liya aap samjhe nahi madam hamare se waste nahi hua lapse nahi to waste ho gaya humko nahi pata tha.
Customer: Hum use nahi the na madam yearly wali kyu precious hai maan lo ye weekly wali khatam ho gayi to.
Executive: Aapke paas paanch hai paanch hai.
Customer: Nahi madam paanch hai wo alag cheez ho gayi saal bhar ke liye paanch yaani teen mahine me ek padti hai madam aise thodi hota hai.
Customer: Aap aap jisse bhi aapke senior se aapke senior se baat kar lo aap bata do usko reset kar sakte hai ya nahi kar sakte.
Executive: Main aage ka ek second aap line pe rahiye.
Customer: Haan ji.
(silence)
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji sir dekhiye nahi ho payega wo company ki policy hai aapko.
Customer: Aapne use kiya na sir aapne hi kiya na use.
Customer: Madam hum kaha humko nahi pata humne kaunsi lead use kari kyuki aapne humko yearly bataya nahi.
Executive: Pata ho ya nahi pata ho use to aapne hi kiya hai na sir use to aapne hi kiya hai na kisi aur ne to nahi kiya use.
Executive: Aur buylead aapne purchase kiya na sir ek policy hoti hai ki hum aapko hafte me 10 buylead denge theek hai aur kya kehte hai yearly aapko 10 mila aapko ab aapne use kar liya ab aap humse wapas maang rahe ho to fir hum kaha se aapko denge sir aap bhi to samjho na ye cheez possible nahi hai.
Customer: Mera basic question mujhe request ye hai ki humko nahi bataya gaya ki 10 lead yearly wali mil rahi hai.
Executive: Kyu aap Sohel bhai se puch lo aap Sohel bhai se puch lo unse yaani pichle hafte bhar se unse baat hui Mayank bhai to abhi do din se hamare picture me aaye hai.
Executive: Kya bol rahi hu sir aapke paas abhi bhi paanch hai agar aapne paanch use kar liya to aapke paanch hai.
Customer: To main kya lunga madam mere ko fir services withdraw karne ke liye mail dal dunga aise nahi hota hai aap hum information nahi dete hum ab bolte hai ki use kar liya.
Executive: Sir aapko jaisa theek lage aapko aapko kuch aisa theek lage agar aapko wapas me service ye karna hai to aap karwa lo koi problem nahi hai lekin ye company ki policy hai hum aapko aur lead nahi de sakte.
Customer: Nahi madam ye to aapko yearly ka to 10 reset karna padega madam aapko.
Customer: Request hai humko pata nahi tha humko ke bare me jankari nahi thi.
Executive: Sir wo mujhe pata hai sir lekin nahi ho payega ye hai hi nahi sir policy me hi nahi hai sir ye.
Customer: Chalo koi baat nahi madam sochte hai iske bare me.
Executive: Theek hai sir main aage call.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was not informed about yearly leads.

- Wants the yearly leads to be reset.



Resolution:

- Executive stated it is against company policy.

- Executive mentioned 5 yearly leads are remaining.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will consider withdrawing services.



Alert (If Any):

- refund



@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- yearly leads, reset, company policy, refund
